text: int main ( ) { long i , j , a [ 10 ] , n , count , k ; int t , m = 1 ; printf ( "Enter the number of test cases" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( m <= t ) { count = 0 ; printf ( "Enter the size of an array" ) ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; printf ( "\nEnter the array elements" ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { k = i ; for ( j = i ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ k ] <= a [ j ] ) { count ++ ; k = j ; } else break ; } } printf ( "The no. of subarrays are:%ld\n" , count ) ; m ++ ; } return 0 ; }
